announcement.text: Free shipping on orders over $100 | Free returns for 30 days

image_with_text.title: Artisan quality since 2015
image_with_text.text:
Every pair of shoes we create represents our passion for excellence. We use the finest materials and traditional techniques combined with modern innovation to bring you footwear that lasts.

Our commitment to sustainability drives us to create responsible products without sacrificing style or comfort.

newsletter.title: Subscribe and get 10% OFF
newsletter.text: Receive the latest news, exclusive offers, and style tips directly in your inbox.

hero.slide_1_text: Handcrafted luxury footwear made from the finest Italian leather. Each pair represents generations of artisan expertise.
hero.slide_2_text: Three generations of shoemaking excellence. Every stitch tells a story of dedication and mastery.
hero.slide_3_text: Refined classics for the modern gentleman. Sophistication meets contemporary style.

announcement.text: Complimentary Shipping & Returns on All Orders • Handmade in Florence Since 1952

image_with_text_1.title: Three Generations of Excellence
image_with_text_1.text:
Since 1952, our family has dedicated itself to the art of shoemaking. Each pair is handcrafted in our atelier in Florence, using techniques passed down through generations.

We source only the finest leathers from Tuscany, ensuring every shoe meets our exacting standards of quality and elegance.

image_with_text_2.title: Made by Hand
image_with_text_2.text:
Over 200 individual steps go into creating each pair. From cutting the leather to the final polish, our artisans take pride in every detail.

This dedication to craft is what sets our shoes apart and ensures they last a lifetime.

testimonials.heading: Client Testimonials
testimonials.testimonial_1_text: Exceptional quality. I've tried many luxury brands, but the craftsmanship here is truly outstanding. Worth every penny invested.
testimonials.testimonial_2_text: As an Italian, I appreciate fine leather goods. These shoes rival the best from Florence. Bellissimo! An absolute masterpiece.
testimonials.testimonial_3_text: Finally found shoes that match my standards. The fit is perfect and they've aged beautifully over time. A true investment piece.

newsletter.text: Receive exclusive previews of new collections, private events, and personalized recommendations tailored to your taste.

ticker.marquee: FREE SHIPPING • EASY RETURNS • 100% AUTHENTIC • FREE SHIPPING • EASY RETURNS • 100% AUTHENTIC

hero.slide_1_text: Discover the latest sneaker releases. Premium comfort meets street-ready design.
hero.slide_2_text: Classic silhouettes reimagined for the modern sneakerhead.
hero.slide_3_text: End of season sale. Limited time only.

image_with_text.heading: Real vs Fake
image_with_text.text:
Every pair goes through our rigorous authentication process. Our team of experts inspects each sneaker using industry-leading verification methods.

✓ Expert verification
✓ Money-back guarantee
✓ Secure packaging

testimonials.heading: What Sneakerheads Say
testimonials.testimonial_1: Best sneaker store I've found. Shipping was crazy fast and the shoes are 100% legit. Already planning my next purchase!
testimonials.testimonial_2: Finally found a trustworthy source for limited releases. The authentication gives me peace of mind every time.
testimonials.testimonial_3: Customer service went above and beyond. They helped me find a rare pair I'd been hunting for months.

newsletter.text: Get early access to releases, exclusive deals, and sneaker news. Plus 10% off your first order.

image_with_text.text: We don't do mass production. Every piece is designed in-house and made in limited runs. When it's gone, it's gone.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.shipping_answer: Standard shipping takes 3-7 business days. Express shipping is available at checkout.
faq.returns_answer: We offer free returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn with tags attached.
faq.international_answer: Yes! We ship worldwide. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days.

header.text: Find answers to common questions about orders, shipping, and more.

shipping.heading: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.time_answer: Standard shipping takes 3-7 business days within the US. International orders typically arrive in 7-14 business days.
shipping.free_answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $100. Express shipping is available at an additional cost.
shipping.tracking_question: How can I track my order?
shipping.tracking_answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also check your order status in your account.

returns.heading: Returns & Exchanges
returns.policy_answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and with original tags attached.
returns.start_question: How do I start a return?
returns.start_answer: Log into your account and navigate to your order history. Select the order and click 'Start Return' to print your prepaid label.
returns.refund_question: When will I receive my refund?
returns.refund_answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return. It may take an additional 3-5 days to appear on your statement.

products.heading: Products & Sizing
products.size_question: How do I find my size?
products.size_answer: Check our size guide on each product page. We recommend measuring yourself and comparing to our size chart for the best fit.
products.authentic_answer: Absolutely. We only sell 100% authentic products. Every item goes through a verification process before shipping.

footer.text: Our support team is here to help. Reach out anytime.
